column2: (adj) existing as an idea, feeling or quality, not as material object
(noun) the situation within which something exists or happens, and that can help explain it
(verb) to represent or show something in a picture or story
(noun) a measurement of something in a particular direction, especially its height, length or width
(adj) relating to the enjoyment or study of beauty
(adj) being an extremely important and basic characteristic of a person or thing
(noun) a particular way of considering something
(noun) the way that someone or something is described or represented in a painting, film, book, or other artistic work
(noun) a way of thinking and acting based on facts and what is possible, rather than on hopes for thingd that are unlikely to happen
(noun) the set of colours into which a beam of light can be separated, or a range o waves, such as light waves or radio waves
